content:
Should the IG Builder report the warnings to the output that they need a narrative when the generator creates a consistent one for you?

warning
A resource should have narrative for robust management [text.div.exists()]
here are you getting that warning? the validation runs after narratives are generated

Scroll to the bottom of this page
http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/VhDir/qa.html
Its littered all through the qa
